posts.post_content: If no one is left to weep, who the hell is crying in the picture?
posts.html:
If no one is left to weep, who the hell is crying in the picture?
Report Abuse  
Posted By: InternetNinjacy (4/14/2011 8:34:13 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
*"When mortals die, they have family, friends, compatriots to mourn them. When the land dies, all else dies with it, and there is no one left to weep."*   
   
Except for the person in the artwork. Really, who was respeonsible for pairing that art with that flavor text?
posts.html:
"When mortals die, they have family, friends, compatriots to mourn them. When the land dies, all else dies with it, and there is no one left to weep."
